record.description: Hyde Park-Kenwood Community Conference Steering Committee meeting in the First Unitarian Church conference room. Clockwise, from entrance at left: Mrs. Randall S. Hilton; Warren C. Seyfert (Private Nursery and Parochial Schools Subcommittee co-chairman); William C. Bradbury; Leslie T. Pennington (chairman, at table); Mrs. Emanuel Malner; Dr. E. E. Hasbrouck; Richard Younker; Miss Lucy Carver (Community Organization Committee co-chairman, at table); Russell B. Babcock (behind her); Herbert A. Thelen (Block Organization Committee chairman, at table); Cornell Taylor; Julia Abrahamson (secretary and executive director, right foreground); Reverend L. Pennington (Unitarian Church minister).
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer, PR and HPKCC stamps.
